channel.title: Auto-Donate
channel.description: Players on my server are donating, but they can't do ::claimdonation to claim the donation. I have to be online to give it to them. How can I fix this? -- Skype: Treven.Baileyy

item.title: Auto-Donate
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Players on my server are donating, but they can’t do ::claimdonation to claim the donation. I have to be online to give it to them. How can I fix this? – Skype: Treven.Baileyy
